synthesis_conditions.comments: The route was also successful with Br2BAr' but led to lower yields of isolated product (23%).

synthesis_conditions.reaction: 1 with 2 equiv of KC8 in THF
synthesis_conditions.comments: Extremely air- and moisture-sensitive and only stable in the presence of THF.
Selective liberation of the borylene moiety DBN(SiMe3)2, considered as transient species.

synthesis_conditions.reaction: Postulated from the rearrangement of the borylene unit DBN(SiMe3)2 with migration of one SiMe3 group from N to the adjacent B
synthesis_conditions.yield: Not isolated due to poor stability
synthesis_conditions.comments: Owing to its oily consistency and poor stability (slow decomposition during the work-up), all attempts to isolate the boron-containing species from the mother liquor failed.
